title: Sunil Chhetri:Sunil Chhetri Emphasises The Need For Team Effort Ahead Of World Cup Qualifier Game Against Bangladesh
text:
India's talisman and captain Sunil Chhetri has emphasised the need for the team to perform as a whole and has said this team under head coach Igor Stimac does not need him to be successful.

AFP

"The Indian team doesn't need Sunil Chhetri to put up a good performance. I am just one of the 23 players in the team. I''m a little bit lucky and little bit more experienced. That''s about it," Chhetri told reporters at the pre-match press conference ahead of the India-Bangladesh Group E Asian Qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup tie here.

The Indian striker was missing due to injury for the Blue's famous draw against Asian champions Qatar, but is back fit and will lead the line against Bangladesh in the World Cup qualifier on Tuesday.

AFP

Though he missed the game, he is taking it in good spirits, "It was because of my absence that they played so well in the Qatar game. That''s what the players keep reminding me."

The Indian captain will be looking to show his more natural self on the field and terrorise the Bangladesh defence when he takes to the field at the Salt Lake Stadium. India desperately need a win after just one point from the first two games.

The match will kickoff at 7:30 IST.

(With Inputs From IANS)
